text:
You write bad prompts on ChatGPT.

Here's how to fix it:

1. Ask ChatGPT to ask you questions.
2. Use a step-by-step format. 
3. Be clear & precise.

It's all about "context engineering" more than "prompt engineering". I wrote a free blog about it how to master it: https://lnkd.in/dDfJK_Mp.

☑ Don't use AI to confirm what you already think.
☑ Use AI to explore what you haven't considered. 

PS: I share how I master AI with words, not code, on my blog "how-to-ai.guide". Unsubscribe anytime.
